job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: Position: ETL Data Engineer with PostgreSQL Experience<br>Duration: Long Term<br>Location: NYC, NY | Lake Mary, FL (Remote work till COVID)<br>No. of positions: 1<br><br>12 -15 years’ experience working with data (data engineering, Design lead , Building Framework and Solutions etc.) <br>Experience analyzing and working with large datasets and designing solution a must<br>Strong experience in building/designing reusable solution and framework <br>Proficiency with SQL – 10+ years’ experience <br>Strong experience in PostgreSQL, Redshift DB<br>Strong experience in working Cloud framework <br>Strong experience of ETL tools like Informatica PowerCenter -10+ years’ experience<br>Strong experience in IICS . Minimum 2+ years’ experience<br>Strong experience in AWS different components . Must be proficient in Athena, Redshift, S3,Lamda,Glue etc.<br>Experience using GitHub<br>Must be able to both read & understand code as well as feel comfortable using code as a tool for data analysis <br>Experience using tools like Alteryx<br>Demonstrated Critical thinking ability including the ability to define a problem, frame it for a broad audience and collaborate with others to formulate solutions <br>Excellent communication skills. <br>Ability to work independently and as part of a team with proven ability to influence with impact across functions and disciplines. <br>Must be detail oriented <br>Must be familiar working in agile environment<br>
